<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_project_fibo</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>test Fibo</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	try{
		var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		request.setEndpoint('https://dev67571.service-now.com/api/192449/projectfibo');
		request.setHttpMethod('GET');

		//Eg. UserName="admin", Password="admin" for this code sample.
		var user = 'admin';
		var password = 'admin';

		request.setBasicAuth(user,password);
		request.setRequestHeader("Accept","application/json");
		request.setQueryParameter('n',current.u_number);


		var response = request.execute();
		var status = response.getStatusCode();
		if(status == 200){
			current.u_response = JSON.parse(response.getBody()).result;
			current.update();
		}
		else
		{
			gs.addErrorMessage("Request Failed");
		}
	}
	catch(e)
	{
		gs.log("Exception found "+e);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-26 16:53:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cbbdee6a2f143010ed86cfedf699b61a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>test Fibo</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="FiboTest" source="d6d9ea222f143010ed86cfedf699b652">d6d9ea222f143010ed86cfedf699b652</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="FiboTest">d6d9ea222f143010ed86cfedf699b652</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cbbdee6a2f143010ed86cfedf699b61a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-26 17:23:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cbbdee6a2f143010ed86cfedf699b61a"/></record_update>
